h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Gold Button Location
content: The Gold Button is dropped by one of the Fire Giants in the Emerald Hall in Furnace Valley within the Flaming Mountains.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gold_Button.md', within the main section titled 'Gold Button', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Gold Button Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Gold Button is dropped by one of the Fire Giants in the Emerald Hall in Furnace Valley within the Flaming Mountains.
